body:
{"success": true, "data": {"answer": "Some key differences between selling on the Amazon CN (China) vs US marketplace include:

1. Registration requirements: For the CN marketplace, you need a Chinese business license, Chinese bank account, and legal representative ID card. For the US, you only need a US bank account/credit card, tax ID number, and business address.

2. Seller types: The CN marketplace only has a Professional Seller plan (¥300/month), while the US has both Individual (per-item fee) and Professional plans.

3. Product compliance: The CN marketplace has additional requirements like CCC certification for many products, China Food Safety Law for imported food, cosmetics/medical device registration with NMPA, and import licenses/documentation. The US has requirements like FDA, FCC, CPSC standards. 4. Fulfillment: Both have Fulfillment by Amazon options, but the CN FBA has fewer warehouses concentrated in major cities, while the US FBA has 175+ warehouses across the country.

5. Marketing tools: The US has more established marketing tools like Sponsored Products ads, Amazon Vine for reviews, and Lightning Deals. The CN marketplace is still developing these.

6. Cultural considerations: For the CN market, sellers need to be aware of things like lucky/unlucky numbers, color preferences, gift-giving customs, and major shopping festivals like 11.11 and 6.18.", "citations": [{"content": "# Amazon Seller Guide - United States Marketplace ## Marketplace: US **Region**: North America **Currency**: USD **Language**: English **Marketplace ID**: ATVPDKIKX0DER ## Getting Started as a US Seller ### Registration Requirements To sell on Amazon.com, you need: - Valid US bank account or internationally chargeable credit card - Tax identification number (SSN or EIN) - Business address (can be international) - Phone number for verification ### Seller Types 1. **Individual Seller**: $0.99 per ...", "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-us.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-us.md", "marketplace": "US", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "english", "region": "north_america", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3AuKnkS5sBidWoWjhbsb5z", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}, {"content": "# Amazon Seller Guide - China Marketplace ## Marketplace: CN (Amazon.cn) **Region**: Asia Pacific **Currency**: CNY (Chinese Yuan) **Language**: Simplified Chinese **Marketplace ID**: AAHKV2X7AFYLW ## Getting Started as a CN Seller ### Registration Requirements To sell on Amazon.cn, you need: - Chinese business license (营业执照) - Chinese bank account - Legal representative ID card - Business registration address in China - Chinese phone number ### Seller Types 1. **Individual Seller**: Not availab...", "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "marketplace": "CN", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "chinese", "region": "asia_pacific", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3AT2bkS5sBF6DLs3_vrnPe", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}, {"content": "Cross-border data transfer restrictions ## Resources for CN Sellers - **Amazon China Seller University**: Localized training (Chinese) - **Seller Forums**: Chinese language community - **Customer Service**: Chinese-speaking support team - **Third-party Service Providers**: Logistics, translation, compliance ## Important Dates (CN Calendar) - CPC bidding starting at ¥0.10 - Average CPC: ¥0.50-¥3.00 - Integration with Amazon DSP available ### Amazon Prime China - Prime membership available - Benefits include faster shipping, Prime Video - Growing subscriber base ### Key Shopping Events - **11.11 (Double 11)**: Largest shopping event (November 11) - **6.18 (618 Festival)**: Mid-year shopping festival (June 18) - **Black Friday**: Growing adoption in China - **Chinese...", "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-cn.md", "marketplace": "CN", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "chinese", "region": "asia_pacific", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3AUmbkS5sBF6DLs3_vrnPf", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}, {"content": "(5 recommended) - Enhanced Brand Content (A+ Content) for registered brands - Video content increases conversion by 80% ### Customer Service - Respond to messages within 24 hours - Maintain Order Defect Rate < 1% - Keep Pre-fulfillment Cancel Rate < 2.5% - Late Shipment Rate < 4% ## Popular Product Categories (US) 1. **Electronics**: High demand, competitive 2. **Home & Kitchen**: Steady growth 3. **Toys & Games**: Seasonal peaks (Q4) 4. **Health & Personal Care**: Growing category 5. **Sports &...", "location": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-us.md", "metadata": {"x-amz-bedrock-kb-source-uri": "s3://knowledge-base-313117444016-us-west-2/documents/seller-guide-us.md", "marketplace": "US", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-data-source-id": "E2EDW4MOKC", "language": "english", "region": "north_america", "x-amz-bedrock-kb-chunk-id": "1%3A0%3AuqnkS5sBidWoWjhbsb5z", "document_type": "seller_guide"}}], "citation_count": 5, "query": "What are the key differences between selling on Amazon CN vs US marketplace?", "model": "anthropic.claude-3-sonnet-20240229-v1:0"}, "timestamp": "2025-12-25T15:32:23.703697Z"}
